name: Time Chamber
description:
This is our game for the MiniJam57: Underground.

You are an archaeologist from the future. To find out the origin of an ancient underground structure you just bought a time machine that you are going to use.
To go into the past you have to collect artifacts from the period you want to jump to.

Contorls:

- WASD: Move
- Left Click: Collect Item or Interact with Object- Right Click: Investigate Object

Credits of music and sounds:

  • Time machine: CC0 by josepharaoh99 https://freesound.org/people/josepharaoh99/sounds/368512/
  • floating: CC BY, Floating Cities by Kevin MacLeod: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3765-floating-cities
  • supernatural: CC BY, Supernatural by Kevin MacLeod: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4446-supernatural
  • dragging: CC BY DWOBoyle: https://freesound.org/people/DWOBoyle/sounds/449284/
